00061 class APP_EXPORT EGS_SimpleApplication {

00090     virtual ~EGS_SimpleApplication();

00092     //
00093     // ************************ geometry functions **********************
00094     //
00097     inline int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00098             EGS_Float &t, int *newmed) { return g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed); };
00101     inline EGS_Float hownear(int ireg,const EGS_Vector &x) {
00102         return g->hownear(ireg,x); };
00104     inline int getMedium(int ireg) { return g->medium(ireg); };
00105 
00106     //
00107     // ******************** ausgab ***************************************
00108     //
00116     virtual int ausgab(int) { return 0; };

00119     // ********* finish the simulation
00120     //

00131     //
00140     virtual int run();

00143     // ********* how often to report the progress of the simulation
00144     //
00148     void setNProgress(int nprog) { nreport = nprog; };

00151     // ********* functions to be executed before and after a shower.

00224 #define APP_MAIN(app_name) \
00225     int main(int argc, char **argv) { \
00226         app_name app(argc,argv); \
00227         app.run(); \
00228         app.reportResults(); \
00229         app.finish(); \
00230         return 0; \
00231     }
00232 
00233 #define APP_LIB(app_name) \
00234     extern "C" {\
00235         APP_EXPORT EGS_SimpleApplication* createApplication(int argc, char **argv) {\
00236             return new app_name(argc,argv);\
00237         }\
00238     }
